name: Revival Trance Collector's Edition (Final Fantasy Commander Precon Decklist)

main.name: Terra, Herald of Hope
main.oracle_text:
Trance — At the beginning of combat on your turn, mill two cards. Terra gains flying until end of turn.
Whenever Terra deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}. When you do, return target creature card with power 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.

card.name: Celes, Rune Knight
card.oracle_text:
When Celes enters, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards plus one.
Whenever one or more other creatures you control enter, if one or more of them entered from a graveyard or was cast from a graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

card.name: Summon: Esper Valigarmanda
card.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after IV.)
I — Exile an instant or sorcery card from each graveyard.
II, III, IV — Add {R} for each lore counter on this Saga. You may cast an instant or sorcery card exiled with this Saga, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.
Flying, haste

card.name: General Leo Cristophe
card.oracle_text: When General Leo Cristophe enters, return up to one target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Then put a +1/+1 counter on General Leo Cristophe for each creature you control.
card.flavor_text: "You're a human being before you're a soldier."

card.name: Coin of Fate
card.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, surveil 1.
{3}{W}, {T}, Exile two creature cards from your graveyard, Sacrifice this artifact: An opponent chooses one of the exiled cards. You put that card on the bottom of your library and return the other to the battlefield tapped. You become the monarch.

card.name: Cyan, Vengeful Samurai
card.oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
Double strike
Whenever one or more creature cards leave your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Cyan.
card.flavor_text: "There will be no mercy for thee!"

card.name: Tragic Arrogance
card.oracle_text: For each player, you choose from among the permanents that player controls an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker. Then each player sacrifices all other nonland permanents they control.

card.name: Angel of the Ruins
card.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, exile up to two target artifacts and/or enchantments.
Plainscycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Sun Titan
card.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
card.flavor_text: Wrexsoul is formed of the countless souls lost during the conflict one thousand years past...

card.name: Palace Jailer
card.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, you become the monarch.
When this creature enters, exile target creature an opponent controls until an opponent becomes the monarch.
card.flavor_text: "I think we all know who really deserves to be locked up in here..."

card.name: Espers to Magicite
card.oracle_text: Exile each opponent's graveyard. When you do, choose up to one target creature card exiled this way. Create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's an artifact and it loses all other card types.
card.flavor_text: "Come to me, my magicite pretty... come, and help me build the Magitek Empire of Kefka!"

card.name: The Falcon, Airship Restored
card.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever The Falcon deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice it. When you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
{4}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Crew 2

card.name: Siegfried, Famed Swordsman
card.oracle_text:
Menace
When Siegfried enters, mill three cards. Then put X +1/+1 counters on Siegfried, where X is twice the number of creature cards in your graveyard.
card.flavor_text: Recent rumors speak of an impostor that shows up and masquerades as Siegfried himself.

card.name: Rejoin the Fight
card.oracle_text: Mill three cards. Then starting with the next opponent in turn order, each opponent chooses a creature card in your graveyard that hasn't been chosen. Return each card chosen this way to the battlefield under your control.
card.flavor_text: "I have to fight... to protect the people I love, and to make the world a safe place for new lives!"

card.name: Shadow, Mysterious Assassin
card.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Throw — Whenever Shadow deals combat damage to a player, you may sacrifice another nonland permanent. If you do, draw two cards and each opponent loses life equal to the mana value of the sacrificed permanent.

card.name: Interceptor, Shadow's Hound
card.oracle_text:
Menace
Assassins you control have menace.
Whenever you attack with one or more legendary creatures, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Pitiless Plunderer
card.oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
card.flavor_text: "We're gonna go into the castle through a secret cave that nobody else knows about!"

card.name: Morbid Opportunist
card.oracle_text: Whenever one or more other creatures die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
card.flavor_text:
"Great people here! You can trust everything they say!"
—Zozo resident

card.name: Laughing Mad
card.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
Flashback {3}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost and any additional costs. Then exile it.)

card.name: Gau, Feral Youth
card.oracle_text:
Rage — Whenever Gau attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
At the beginning of each end step, if a card left your graveyard this turn, Gau deals damage equal to its power to each opponent.
card.flavor_text: "Uwao! Aooh! I'm Gau! Your friend! Frieeend!!!"

card.name: Sabin, Master Monk
card.oracle_text:
Double strike
Blitz—{2}{R}{R}, Discard a card. (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)
You may cast this card from your graveyard using its blitz ability.

card.name: Strago and Relm
card.oracle_text: Sketch and Lore — {2}{R}, {T}: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant, sorcery, or creature card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. If you cast a creature spell this way, it gains haste and "At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice this creature." Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Reanimate
card.oracle_text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.
card.flavor_text:
"The world is about to learn... the meaning of... fear..."
—Emperor Geshtahl

card.name: Stitch Together
card.oracle_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Threshold — Return that card from your graveyard to the battlefield instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

card.name: Gogo, Mysterious Mime
card.oracle_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Gogo become a copy of another target creature you control until end of turn, except its name is Gogo, Mysterious Mime. If you do, Gogo and that creature each get +2/+0 and gain haste until end of turn and attack this turn if able.

card.name: Umaro, Raging Yeti
card.oracle_text:
Trample
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one at random —
• Other creatures you control get +3/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.
• Discard your hand, then draw four cards.
• Umaro deals 5 damage to any target.

card.name: Ruin Grinder
card.oracle_text:
Menace
When this creature dies, each player may discard their hand and draw seven cards.
Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

card.name: Combustible Gearhulk
card.oracle_text:
First strike
When this creature enters, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then this creature deals damage to that player equal to the total mana value of those cards.

card.name: Anger
card.oracle_text:
Haste
As long as this card is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.
card.flavor_text:
"Relm's inside!"
—Strago Magus

card.name: Big Score
card.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")
card.flavor_text: "Look, I finally found it... The legendary treasure that can undo death itself."

card.name: Stitcher's Supplier
card.oracle_text: When this creature enters or dies, mill three cards. (Put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.)
card.flavor_text: All those wounded by the necromancer's zombie stick are doomed to a fate of eternal undeath!

card.name: Sepulchral Primordial
card.oracle_text:
Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
When this creature enters, for each opponent, you may put up to one target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Rise of the Dark Realms
card.oracle_text: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.
card.flavor_text:
"You can't destroy everything! People will always have dreams!"
—Terra Branford

card.name: Snort
card.oracle_text:
Each player may discard their hand and draw five cards. Then Snort deals 5 damage to each opponent who discarded their hand this way.
Flashback {5}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Night's Whisper
card.oracle_text: You draw two cards and you lose 2 life.
card.flavor_text:
"My love... you made me so happy. Thank you..."
—Elayne Garamonde

card.name: Phoenix Down
card.oracle_text:
{1}{W}, {T}, Exile this artifact: Choose one —
• Return target creature card with mana value 4 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
• Exile target Skeleton, Spirit, or Zombie.
card.flavor_text: A feather with the power to revive those who have exhausted their strength.

card.name: Banon, the Returners' Leader
card.oracle_text:
Pray — Once during each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell from among cards in your graveyard that were put there from anywhere other than the battlefield this turn.
Whenever you attack, you may pay {1} and discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
card.flavor_text: "You are this world's last ray of light... our final hope."

card.name: Edgar, Master Machinist
card.oracle_text:
Once during each of your turns, you may cast an artifact spell from your graveyard. If you cast a spell this way, that artifact enters tapped.
Tools — Whenever Edgar attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest mana value among artifacts you control.

card.name: Kefka, Dancing Mad
card.oracle_text:
During your turn, Kefka has indestructible.
At the beginning of your end step, exile a card at random from each opponent's graveyard. You may cast any number of spells from among cards exiled this way without paying their mana costs. Then each player who owns a spell you cast this way loses life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Archfiend of Depravity
card.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest.
card.flavor_text: Ancient monsters that had long been sealed away were released when the world was ripped apart.

card.name: Flayer of the Hatebound
card.oracle_text:
Undying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever this creature or another creature enters from your graveyard, that creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.

card.name: Locke, Treasure Hunter
card.oracle_text:
Locke can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.
Mug — Whenever Locke attacks, each player mills a card. If a land card was milled this way, create a Treasure token. Until end of turn, you may cast a spell from among those cards.

card.name: Mog, Moogle Warrior
card.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Dance — At the beginning of your end step, each player may discard a card. Each player who discarded a card this way draws a card. If a creature card was discarded this way, you create a 1/2 white Moogle creature token with lifelink. Then if a noncreature card was discarded this way, put a +1/+1 counter on each Moogle you control.

card.name: Setzer, Wandering Gambler
card.oracle_text:
When Setzer enters, create The Blackjack, a legendary 3/3 colorless Vehicle artifact token with flying and crew 2.
Whenever a Vehicle you control deals combat damage to a player, flip a coin.
Whenever you win a coin flip, create two tapped Treasure tokens.

card.name: Crackling Doom
card.oracle_text: Crackling Doom deals 2 damage to each opponent. Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the greatest power among creatures that player controls.
card.flavor_text: "No hard feelings, now... I'm just going to use this power you've unleashed to put you to sleep..."

card.name: The Warring Triad
card.oracle_text:
Flying, trample, haste
As long as there are fewer than eight cards in your graveyard, The Warring Triad isn't a creature.
{T}, Mill a card: Target player adds one mana of any color.

card.name: Bedevil
card.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.
card.flavor_text: On that day... the world was changed forever...

card.name: Ruinous Ultimatum
card.oracle_text: Destroy all nonland permanents your opponents control.
card.flavor_text: "This little hamlet has too much 'boring' and not enough 'burning'... Torch everything!"

card.name: Legions to Ashes
card.oracle_text: Exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls and all tokens that player controls with the same name as that permanent.
card.flavor_text:
"Ha-ha! I'm raring to go! Can't be leaving everything up to you whippersnappers!"
—Strago Magus

card.name: Mortify
card.oracle_text: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
card.flavor_text:
"Espers... Who'd have dreamed they were that powerful..."
—Imperial soldier

card.name: Priest of Fell Rites
card.oracle_text:
{T}, Pay 3 life, Sacrifice this creature: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
Unearth {3}{W}{B} ({3}{W}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Arcane Signet
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text:
"Lord Kefka's treasure the treasure... Return the treasure..."
—Kefka's cultists

card.name: Commander's Sphere
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.
card.flavor_text:
"Have you ever heard of something called a Growth Egg? Have you? Hmmm? It was buried in a tomb to the west a looong, long time ago!"
—Kohlingen resident

card.name: Key to the City
card.oracle_text:
{T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn.
Whenever this artifact becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.
card.flavor_text:
"Oh dear... We're really in trouble this time..."
—The Impresario, opera house manager

card.name: Mind Stone
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.
card.flavor_text: A relic that greatly enhances the magical power of its wielder.

card.name: Sol Ring
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}{C}.
card.flavor_text:
"Magicite is an esper's power in its purest form. When an esper dies, magicite is all that's left behind..."
—Ramuh

card.name: Swiftfoot Boots
card.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under your control.)
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
card.flavor_text:
"You can gain all kinds of abilities by equipping relics."
—South Figaro merchant

card.name: Talisman of Conviction
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. This artifact deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"He's alive... Locke's alive!"
—Celes Chere

card.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
card.oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text: "Treasure, treasure!"

card.name: Solemn Simulacrum
card.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
When this creature dies, you may draw a card.

card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Basic landcycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
card.flavor_text: There's a legend that tells of an ancient battle between the esper Odin and a powerful magus... It took place in the great hall of a castle.

card.name: Command Tower
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
card.flavor_text:
"Kefka's practically a god now, sitting up in that tower of his with the power of the Warring Triad at his command..."
—Albrook citizen

card.name: Fetid Heath
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{W/B}, {T}: Add {W}{W}, {W}{B}, or {B}{B}.
card.flavor_text:
"Nowhere... to... run... Nowhere... to... hide... No escape... for... you..."
-—Ghosts on the Phantom Train

card.name: Dragonskull Summit
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
card.flavor_text: Eight dragons seal away its awesome might; the might of the one called "Crusader." And when the eight shall fall, the one again shall rise.

card.name: Demolition Field
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. That land's controller may search their library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. You may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Clifftop Retreat
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
card.flavor_text:
"Our mission is to survey a run-down reactor."
—Sephiroth

card.name: Talisman of Indulgence
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}. This artifact deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text: "Hee-hee-hee! You're not getting away from me!"

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. This land deals 1 damage to you.
card.flavor_text:
"Welcome to the new world order."
—Rufus Shinra

card.name: Furycalm Snarl
card.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal a Mountain or Plains card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.
card.flavor_text:
"It sure helped having Cid here. I had no idea he could drive a train..."
—Red XIII

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
card.flavor_text:
"Both the Crusaders and the Al Bhed truly wish peace for Spira. This Operation Miʼhen was born from that wish they share."
—Seymour Guado

card.name: Exotic Orchard
card.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
card.flavor_text:
"We have been expecting you, Lady Yuna. Welcome to Guadosalam."
—Tromell, Seymour's butler

card.name: Path of Ancestry
card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity. When that mana is spent to cast a creature spell that shares a creature type with your commander, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

card.name: Meteor Golem
card.oracle_text: When this creature enters, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.
card.flavor_text: A mechanical monster equipped with a massive arsenal of weapons and attacks, including its signature Wave Cannon.

card.name: Millikin
card.oracle_text: {T}, Mill a card: Add {C}. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
card.flavor_text: A machine that dazes and confuses its enemies with bewildering signals.

card.name: Rogue's Passage
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
card.flavor_text:
"Make your way out of town through the mines! I'll try to buy you some time."
-—Old man from Narshe

card.name: Rugged Prairie
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{R/W}, {T}: Add {R}{R}, {R}{W}, or {W}{W}.
card.flavor_text:

card.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {R} or {W}.)
This land enters tapped.
card.flavor_text:
"So this is the power of the Warring Triad! With this and my magicite... the world will be mine to command!"

card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{B/R}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{R}, or {R}{R}.
card.flavor_text:
"At times we were friendly rivals, and at times we were simply friends. We'd always talk about our dreams... Like which of us would be first to sail beyond the sky to the stars."

card.name: Desolate Mire
card.flavor_text:

As this land enters, you may reveal a Swamp or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.

card.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Plains or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
card.flavor_text: This is the Sealed Gate... Beyond there is the esper world.

card.name: High Market
card.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain 1 life.
card.flavor_text:
"Pretty impressive that a kid like me can run a business, don't ya think? You should buy something to encourage me!"
—Nikeah boy

card.name: Shadowblood Ridge
card.flavor_text:
"The time has come for us to claim our rightful dominion over the world!"
—Emperor Gestahl

card.name: Sunscorched Divide
card.flavor_text:

card.oracle_text:
As this land enters, you may reveal a Plains or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, this land enters tapped.

({T}: Add {B} or {R}.)

card.flavor_text: In order to reach the Sealed Gate and enter the land of the espers, one must brave a volcanic dungeon, fraught with vile monsters.

tokens.name: The Monarch
tokens.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your end step, draw a card.
Whenever a creature deals combat damage to you, its controller becomes the monarch.

tokens.name: Tower Winder
tokens.oracle_text:
Reach, deathtouch
When this creature enters, search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Command Tower, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
tokens.flavor_text: The tower guards eventually gave up, figuring it was better at the job anyway.

tokens.name: Treasure
tokens.oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.

originalDeck.name: Revival Trance (Final Fantasy Commander Precon Decklist)
